00021 namespace CALICE {

00025 enum EIntValues {kIntValFeInfoBoardId, kIntValFeInfoLabel, kIntValFeInfoFeID,
00026                  kIntValFeInfoFrameSyncOutPacked0,kIntValFeInfoFrameSyncOutPacked2,
00027                  kIntValFeInfoFeLength,
00028                  kIntValFeInfoFrameSyncOutPacked4,
00029                  kIntValFeInfoFifo,
00030                  kIntValFeInfoTriggerCounter,
00031                  kNIntValuesFeInfo};
00032 
00042 class FeInfo : public LCFixedObject<kNIntValuesFeInfo,NFLOAT,NDOUBLE> {
00043   
00044 public: 
00045     
00046 
00050   FeInfo(int boardID) {
00051     obj()->setIntVal( kIntValFeInfoBoardId , boardID  ) ;
00052   };
00053 
00056   int  getBoardID() const {return getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoBoardId);};
00057   
00058 
00061   FeInfo(LCObject* obj) : LCFixedObject<kNIntValuesFeInfo,NFLOAT,NDOUBLE>(obj) { } 
00062   
00066   FeInfo &  setLabel(int label) {obj()->setIntVal(kIntValFeInfoLabel,label);return *this;};
00067 
00071   int  getLabel() const {return getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoLabel);};
00072 
00076   FeInfo &  setFeID(int fe_id) {obj()->setIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFeID,fe_id);return *this;};
00077 
00081   int  getFeID() const {return getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFeID);};
00082   
00095   FeInfo &  setFrameSyncOut(int sync_words_01, int sync_words_23, int sync_word_4) {
00096     obj()->setIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFrameSyncOutPacked2,sync_words_01);
00097     obj()->setIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFrameSyncOutPacked0,sync_words_23);
00098     obj()->setIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFrameSyncOutPacked4,sync_word_4);
00099     return *this;
00100   };
00101 
00106   int  getFrameSyncOut(int word_i) const {
00107 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00108     assert(static_cast<unsigned int>(word_i)<5);
00109 #endif
00110     if (word_i==4) {
00111       return (getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFrameSyncOutPacked4) ) & 0xffff;
00112     }
00113     else {
00114       word_i = (word_i >= 2 ? word_i-2 : word_i+2);
00115       if (word_i & 1) {
00116         // high half word
00117         return (getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFrameSyncOutPacked0+(word_i>>1)) >> 16 ) & 0xffff;
00118       }
00119       else {
00120         // low half word
00121         return (getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFrameSyncOutPacked0+(word_i>>1)) ) & 0xffff;
00122       }
00123     }
00124   };
00125   
00126 
00130   FeInfo &  setFeLength(int fe_length) {  
00131     // the fe length is sotred in the high half word.
00132     obj()->setIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFeLength,getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFeLength) & 0xffff
00133                                            + ((fe_length & 0xffff)<<16) );
00134     return *this;
00135   };
00136 
00140   int  getFeLength() const {
00141     // the fe length is sotred in the high half word.
00142     return (getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFeLength)>>16) & 0xffff;
00143   };
00144 
00145 
00149   FeInfo &  setBeStatus(int be_status) {
00150     // the be status high half word is stored in the low half word of the fe length field
00151     obj()->setIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFeLength,  getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFeLength) & 0xffff0000
00152                                              + ((be_status>>16) & 0xffff) );
00153 
00154     // the be status low half word is stored in the high half word of the forth frame sync out word:
00155     obj()->setIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFrameSyncOutPacked4,  getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFrameSyncOutPacked4) & 0xffff
00156                                                      + ((be_status & 0xffff)<<16) );
00157     return *this;
00158   };
00159 
00163   int  getBeStatus() const {return   ((getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFeLength) & 0xffff)<<16)
00164                                    + ((getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFrameSyncOutPacked4)>>16) & 0xffff);};
00165 
00166 
00170   FeInfo &  setTriggerCounter(int trigger_counter) {obj()->setIntVal(kIntValFeInfoTriggerCounter,trigger_counter);return *this;};
00171 
00175   int  getTriggerCounter() const {return getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoTriggerCounter);};
00176 
00180   FeInfo &  setFifo(int fifo) {obj()->setIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFifo,fifo);return *this;};
00181 
00186   int  getFifoFeID() const {return getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFifo) & 0xff;};
00187 
00190   int  getFifoStatus() const {return getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFifo) >> 8;};
00191 
00194   int  getNumberOfFifoWords() const {
00195     return ((getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFifo) >> 8) &0xffff);
00196   };
00197 
00201   bool  isFifoFull() const {return getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFifo) & (1<<25);};
00202 
00206   bool  isFifoEmpty() const {return getIntVal(kIntValFeInfoFifo) & (1<<24);};
00207 
00210   void print(  std::ostream& os) const;
00211 
00212   // -------- need to implement abstract methods from LCGenericObject
00213 
00216   const std::string getTypeName() const { 
00217     return"FeInfo" ;
00218   } 
00219   
00222   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00223     return "i:BoardID,RecordLabel,fe; s:packed[5]:frameSyncOutPacked; s:beStatus,feLength; i:fifo, trigger counter" ;
00224   }

00226 }; // class
